hackathon-description-text: What if the most creative minds channeled their focus into solving the most impactful problems of today? Imagine if we could apply the ingenuity that powers the most profound technology into the most fundamental of all human concerns:

hackathon-judges.judge-role: Global Chief Information Security Officer (CISO) at Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu Limited
Co-Founder at Digital Ocean, Founder at TechDay HQ

hackathon-requirements: Create your project at MedHacks, submit it on DevPost, and pitch to the judges to demo your hack!
hackathon-description-header: Are you ready to change the future of health?

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Leap Motion controllers to each member of the winning team
$200 Amazon gift card to best solution to the following challenges:
Advance to Final round of due diligence from student run venture capital firm A-level Capital for the hack that addresses most immediate healthcare needs
The winning team receives an Oculus Rift
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best use of the Mana Health API

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=3400 N Charles St, Baltimore, MD 21218, USA
hackathon-location-address: 3400 N Charles St, Baltimore, MD 21218, USA
hackathon-location-description: Johns Hopkins University - Bloomberg Center for Physics and Astronomy
